inn1.comm: and he begins with a no-ball, which Butt defends tentatively to the off
thats not a good ball either, well wide of the stumps, and Perera has some fixing of the radar to do
flicks a half volley off his pads through square leg for four, top shot, and brings up 1000 ODI runs
Butt pushes, rather than flicks this time,  another leg-side offering, and the lightning fast outfield does the rest to the crowd's pleasure
played to short midwicket as Perera struggles to find his line
good length ball, outside off and moves away, he leaves it be
lands it on leg stump again, and Butt turns it away to midwicket for two
short of a length on off stump, he goes back and punches it to mid-off
short again but on on leg stump, Nazir tries to work it away but mistimes the stroke
fuller this time, on middle stump, and thats a lovely flick shot out to deep backward square leg for four more
short again, outside off stump, and he rocks back in a flash and punches it through the off side cordon for four more, and dont the crowd love it?
he compensates for the shorter stuff with a fuller delivery outside off stump, and Nazir drives on the up towards mid-off where Jayawardene dives and saves runs
poor delivery, well wide of off stump, Butt cant play it
good length on leg stump, he plays with the swing and gets an inside-egde onto the pad, and as the ball rolls to leg they pinch a run
full on middle and leg, driven straight to mid-on
good length delivery on the stumps, drawing Butt forward as he defends to mid-on
a tad fuller just outside off stump, and its steered towards backward point, cant beat the fielders can Butt
good length outside off stump, pushed to cover
good length outside off stump again, driven to short cover
lovely, he sees a nice juicy half-volley on leg stump and sends it crashing away to deep midwicket with a sumptious flick off the pads
more fun! Now Nazir gets a rank short delivery outside off stump and cracks it away over gully for four
back of a length on the stumps, he gets behind the line and defends to the off side
banged in short now, he goes for the pull, misses, the ball clips the thigh pad somehow en route to the 'keeper and they all go up in appeal but that clearly not out
short of a length outside leg stump, he looks to nudge it away but cops one on the thigh
short again outside leg stump, he looks to flick it fine but misses and the ball clips pads and runs away for leg-byes
fuller outside off stump, driven right to the man at cover
good length on about middle and leg stump, and Butt easily defends it to mid-on
fullish, a tad, outside off stump, and this time he drives to short extra cover
served up full on leg stump, he flicks but straight to short midwicket, good field placings from Jayawardene, doing his best to stem the run flow
but theres only so much he can do...this time its a slow ball, full outside off stump, and Butt drives with an open face of the bat in the gap between point and cover for four
full and wide outside off stump again, and he softly pushes towards Dilshan at backward point, where a misfield allows the sharp single
back of a length just outside off stump, he goes back and drives to short cover
full outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to mid-off
back of a length on leg stump and he easily taps it to square leg and runs through for the single
his partner's not interested in these things called singles, as indicated by a that fierce back-foot smash through the covers for four!
first strike! Fernando pitches it fuller and straighter, and Nazir plays all around it as it nipped in a touch
nice ball to receive first-up, a nice half-volley on the pads which he disdainfully flicks away for four
good length on the stumps, he tentatively defends it away
this time Butt just pats that back down the track as Perera finally finds his line
another good ball on the stump, and he defends it down the track again
now theres a bit of swing into Butt, who plays a pleasant drive to mid-off
reaches out to a wide ball to drive, his feet going nowhere and he almost inside-edges onto the stumps
strays onto the pads again and Butt times it beautifully but straight to short midwicket, where Warnapura fields, diving, on his ODI debut
drives another full ball straight to mid-off as Perera completes the first, much-needed maiden of the innings
now he leaves theatrically outside off stump, where the bounce isn't great. The outfield is fast, so the bowlers could be in trouuble here
good stuff, right up there on the stumps and Hameed can only defend it back to the bowler
oh ho, overpitched on leg stump and Hameed tucks into one of his favourite shots, the extra cover drive
good length, driven to cover
good length on leg stump, turned past square leg for a brace
full outside off stump, nicely driven down the ground for two more
overpitched outside off stump, and he caresses that through the covers for four, top shot
and again! Butt opens the face of his bat and with a timing Saeed Anwar would've been proud of, guides it to point for another four
good comeback by Perera as Butt is forced to play a forward prod, straight to short cover, for no run
good length outside off stump and Butt drives confidently straight to the man at cover
as if he wasn't struggling enough, Perera bowls an outside the off stump wide
short and wide outside off stump and he flashes a cut but misses
slower ball, and Butt drives without foot movement, straight down the ground for four to end the over
on line, just outside off stump his first ball, which Hameed leaves, but its a no-ball...a tight call, you'd have to say
a tad fuller on the stumps, and Hameed flicks to midwicket
great shot, as Hameed steps across and clips a good ball in front of square leg for four...looking good
fuller in length, just outside off, and its driven down the ground to mid-off
slower ball, just outside off, Hameed leans into it and drives to cover
back of a length just outside off stump, back he goes, pushing into the covers again
tries a slower one, outside off stump, which Hameed runs down to third man for one
starts off with a full delivery outside off stump, and Hameed comes forward and drives on the up through covers for a hard-run three
good length on middle and leg, and he pushes it to the fielder close-in
with fine leg up, Butt sees a shorter delivery on leg stump, gets across and turns it away for four, top shot
good length on off stump, defended back to Fernando
overpitched on leg stump, and he flicks it past square leg for a couple
better stuff, on a good length on the stumps and Butt defend back to the bowler
full outside off stump, he drives hard towards point where Dilshan flings himself around athletically and pulls off a great stop, top-class effort that
full again, and he pushes to Dilshan once more
back of a length outside off stump, he opens the face and steers it to gully
full, he drives back down the ground, and Maharoof does well to stop it with a hand
good length outside off stump, he waits for it and then angles it down to third man for a single
good length outside off stump, pitches and shapes away as Butt leaves it be
back of a length outside off stump, cut hard down to third man where Perera covers good ground and dives to save runs, his captain'll like that effort
overpitched, there to be driven, but Hameed can only drive to cover
fullish again and he drives, this time squarer, where Dilshan again dives and stops it
slower ball this time, fullish on off stump and Hameed drives down the ground, mid-on moves sharply and fields it
full ball, swings in late, and Hameed hustles to drive to short midwicket
good length on off stump, turned straight to short midwicket
fuller in length, just outside off and its left alone
full outside off stump, he drives again but just cant beat the man at cover
middle and leg line, flicked to short midwicket
short of a length on middle and leg, nudged around the corner past square leg for one
back of a length outside off stump, steered down to third man
good length ball, on off stump, pushed to point
good length outside off stump, Hameed expertly dabs it to third man and it beats the fielder
back of a length outside off stump, driven to the man at cover
slower ball, fuller in length, just outside off, he goes for the expansive drive and gets beaten
overpitched this time, he reaches for it and drives, getting a thick outside edge down to third man
back of a length on leg stump, turned past square leg for one
oh well bowled! Full, in the blockhole and he manages to get bat on it, jamming to short midwicket
worked away towards cover, no room for a single there
driven straight to the fielder at mid-off
cut away late and they scamper through for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump, Hameed goes for it and is beaten by a long way
shot! full and on the pads, right in the slot and Hameed clips it away through midwicket for a fantastic boundary
worked away on the leg side, bit of a mix up going for the single and in the end they decide not to go for it
full and on the pads, this is poor bolwing from Perera. Butt waits for the ball and camly works it away through midwicket - no stopping that
short of a good length delivery, drifting down the leg side and Butt works it down to fine leg for a brace.
another wayward delivery, this one is way down the leg side and that's a clear wide
better line and length, punched down to
on the middle and leg stump line, probably the slower one - Butt finds the man at midwicket
full and on the pads and Butt flicks it straight to the fielder placed at short fine leg, missed out there on some easy runs
this time he takes full toll. Another poor delivery on the pads, Butt plays late and gets it past the fielder at short fine leg. End of a poor over from Perera
good length ball just outside off stump, Hameed looks to flick to leg and ends up with a leading edge out to deep cover
good length ball and he steers it down to third man
class! Just a fraction short and he gets up on the toes and punches it through cover and point for four
overpitched this time and he drives to backward point
full again, and he drives on the up to the man at cover, fails to find the gap this time
slower, on a length and he gets behind it and drives to midwicket
well tossed up, driven to deep midwicket for a single
tossed up again, he comes forward and drives into the covers
short ball this time outside off, he goes back and cuts it to Dilshan at point
nice shot! Short again from Bandara, and this time Hameed places his cut in the gap behind point and picks up four
another short ball outside off stump and he rocks back to punch it between the covers for an easy couple
tossed up on off stump, he comes forward and pats it back to Bandara, who's begun with an average over
good length outside off stump, Butt drives, streakily, and sends the no-ball down to third man where the fielder dives over it
good length on middle and off, turned to square leg
slower ball on leg stump, Butt nudges it to backward square leg for a brace
ANOTHER ball on leg stump, to Butt's pleasure, and he picks up two more, easy as they come
good length outside off stump, driven to cover
it was too good to last, as he drifts back to his favoured leg stump, and Butt turns it to midwicket
tossed up, Hameed comes onto the front foot and defends calmly
good flight and loop on that one, and its pushed back to the bowler
quicker, flatter and Hameed shuffles to nudge it around the corner for one
flat again and he uses the feet well, driving down the ground to long-off
tossed up, Butt too uses the feet well and drives for one out to long-on
tossed up, and Hameed, on 49, patiently defends it back down the track
flat trajectory, Butt rocks back and pushes it down the ground to long-on for one
and there's his 50, as he shuffles and turns one to deep square leg, well played sir
tossed up, defended back to Dilshan
well flighted, he comes out and drives to cover
flighted up again, invitingly, and he drives smack to that  man at cover again
short in length, drifting into leg stump, Butt shuffles and drives to long-on for a single
tossed up, he comes down and sweeps it away to fine leg

got 'em! Bandara persists with this well looped up deliveries, tossing one out the back of the hand, landing it on about leg stump, and Hameed, after playing so well to get to his half-century, just tamely chips it back to Bandara for the softest of dismissals
quick and flat, he goes back and drives it to long-on for a single
well tossed up, driven down the ground to long-off
well tossed up, defended back to Bandara
short and flat, he goes onto the backfoot and punches to cover
tossed up, he comes out and drives down to long-off
tossed up again on off stump, he uses the soft hands to turn it straight to short midwicket
again tossed up, Yousuf uses his feet again and turns it to short midwicket
tossed up, driven to mid-on for a qiuck single
short on leg stump, turned to short midwicket
well tossed up, driven in the air but it lands short of Dilshan
flighted up on leg stump, he looks to sweep but doesnt connect well on the shot at all
tossed up on middle and leg, driven to long-on for a single
short and flat, Butt rocks back and drives to long-off
tossed up, he turns it to short midwicket
tossed up on leg stump, he sweeps but misses, hit on the pad outside the line of impact
short and wide, he rocks back and slams the cut expertly behind point and the ball races away for four
short and wide, Butt goes for the cut but connects with air
now its the quicker one, fired down leg side, both batsman and 'keeper miss it and the ball escapes to the to fine leg fence for four
tossed up on leg stump, and its swept away to short fine leg for one
tossed up, Yousuf opts for a reverse sweep to short third man
well tossed up outside off stump, driven to cover for a single
short, flat, he rocks back and punches out to long-on for one
on middle and leg stump, Butt shuffles and drives down to long-on for a single
tossed up on leg stump, swept away to fine leg
tossed up again, and there's another nice-looking sweep shot for one
well tossed up, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
tossed up, he sweeps, not timed well, Butt's keen on the single but his senior parnter isn't and they resist
flatter trajectory, slower too, he waits for it and punches it to long-on for an easy one

he strikes again! Like the delivery to Hameed a while back, Bandara perseveres with a tossed up ball on leg stump, and Butt, so fluent all innings, just chips this back in the air to give the bowler his second simple catch
nice shot there, rocking back and pulling a rank long-hop over midwicket, one bounce and over the ropes for four
faster one, almost beating Yousuf all ends up
short, flat, he shuffles back in his crease and drives out to deep extra cover for two
short again, he pushes to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, just nudged in front of point for a quick single
tossed up, and Maliks defends it back to Dilshan
well tossed up outside off, and its driven to deep cover
ohhh close! Bandara again tosses it up, Malik comes out of his crease, dancing down and mishitting the drive in the air, and Perera at mid-on fails to judge it, dives, misses and gives up four
tossed up, pushed to cover
tossed up again, invitingly, Malik uses the feet well to pick up one out to long-off
yes, you guessed it...tossed up outside off stump, and Yousuf drives out to deep cover
short, wide, and Maliks cuts it late to third man for three
good length delivery on off stump, he pushes it to mid-on
back of a length outside off stump and he runs it off the face of the bat to third man
back of a length on leg stump, turned away to midwicket for one
beaten! Good length outside off stump, he stands there and chases it, looking for the single to third man, and misses
good length ball on middle and leg, Malik shuffles and  tucks it away to midwicket for a brace
full on middle and leg and Malik times his drive down the ground
well tossed up outside off, driven to long-off for one
big shot there ! Bandara tosses it up, Malik comes down the track, slamming it over long-off for half a dozen!
well tossed up, driven to short cover
short of a length, cut in front of point for a quick single
well tossed up, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
short of a length outside off stump, he rocks back and times his cut well for two out to the deep
tossed up, reverse swept for no run
tossed up, pushed back to Dilshan patiently
flatter, he shuffles and nudges it to leg for one
back of a length, driven to mid-on
short and spinning in, shuffles and works it off the pads for one
tossed up, shuffles and turns it to short fine leg, and the umpires call for refreshments
tossed up, pushed to cover, failing to beat the man there
tossed up on leg stump, swept away, via the top edge wide of short fine leg

and he gets a third! Call it a rush of blood to the head, but Malik dances down the track, no doubt eyeing the vacant leg side, Bandara sees him coming, pushes it in a bit faster, beating his charge and the ball thuds into the top of middle and leg, big, big wicket that
tossed up, pushed to cover
oversteps, Akmal drives to long-on for one
tossed up, Yousuf taps it to cover and sets off, Akmal sends him back, he turns and gets back in time and a direct hit is a tad late
tossed up, he drives to long-off and keeps strike
flat outside off stump, pushed into the covers for one
tossed up, nicely driven down to long-on
tossed up on leg stump, Yousuf turns it to short fine leg where a misfield allows two
short  of a length, he pushes it into the covers and runs hard for the second
short on middle and leg, nudged fine for one
short and flat, Akmal pushes to cover for the single
short, flat, back he goes, cutting to cover for one more
tossed up, driven to cover for another simple run
tossed up outside off stump, he reaches out to drive and gets a thick edge down to third man
tossed up, uses the feet and drives to long-off
dropped! He should have had a fourth wicket, and third caught n bowled, but he failsto latch on to a mistimed drive back to him...wrong man to let down!
tossed up, Yousuf defends back to him all along the ground this time
short outside off, Akmal goes back and places his cut behind square for four, nice timing on that one
short on middle and leg this time, and he shuffles to drive into the midwicket region for one
quicker ball fired on leg stump, he too shuffles and picks up one to leg
well tossed up, pushed to cover
short and flat on middle stump, turned around the corner for one
tossed up, he dances down and drives into the covers for one
well tossed up, pushed to point
flatter outside off stump, pushed to the off side for one this time
tossed up, he drives into the covers where Dilshan dives and takes some pace off the ball
tossed up, uses the feet and drives out to the cover sweeper
theres the flipper now, on the stumps, and Akmal hustles to defend
tossed up, he comes forward and kills the spin
short, drifting into him and he shuffles, working it to leg for one

good stuff from Sri Lanka, madness from Pakistan! Dilshan tosses it up on leg stump, Akmal shuffles and turns it to short fine leg, and from the other end Yousuf harries down the track only to see his partner frantically wave him back, Warnapura swoops in, collects it, and fires a good throw back to Dilshan, who whips off the bails with Yousuf nowhere in the frame!
quick on leg stump, turned to midwicket
quick on leg stump, turned to midwicket and he scampers one
tossed up, he comes out and drives to cover
quicker one, pushed through, and he gets forward in defense
good length on leg stump, turned to deep square leg
back of a length outside off stump, he goes back and pushes to cover
a tad fuller, he plays across the line and picks up one
good length outside off stump, he drives, on the up, out to deep cover for one

no boom boom from big man Afridi today! Maharoof gets him to flash his bat at a fuller one outside off stump, draws the leading edge that skies up in the air to deep cover, where Bandara, running in, dives forward and takes a very good low catch! Great effort!
fractionally overpitched and he drives out towards long-off for a couple
short and flat, pushed to mid-on
tossed up, he comes onto the front foot and drives to cover
flat and spins into him, he shuffles and picks up one to leg
tossed up, he drives to the off side and wants one, but Akmal says no to that

close! Dilshan bowls it on on leg stump, Razzaq turns it to midwicket, Akmal too charges down the track for the single, gets sent back, a good throw comes  in and Dilshan removes the bails, the decision is referred but replays show Akmal was just in
short, turned to short midwicket
back of a length outsid off stump, he goes back and drives to cover
good length on middle and leg, he drives down the ground
full outside off stump, pushed to mid-off
slower one outside off stump, he uses the feet and pushes to short cover
overpitched outside off stump, he square-drives but a fantastic effort from Silva at backward point denies him runs
short of a length outside off stump, he opens the face of the bat and runs it to third man
back of a length on middle and leg, he shuffles and drives to long-on
tossed up on leg stump, turned to long leg for one
tossed up, driven down to long-on for one
tossed up again outside off stump, and he drives it to cover
fraction short outside off stump and he carves it out to deep cover
flat on leg stump, he shuffles and works it to midwicket for a sharp single
fullish outside off stump, left alone
well bowled! A quick yorker outside off stump, which he plays at and misses
full again, stays low too as he drives and gets saved by the inside-edge back onto the pads
full outside off stump, he stands rooted and drives, only to get beaten
good length outside off stump, pushed to point
good length outside off stump again, and he runs it to point once more
full outside off stump, driven to cover
swings in from outside off stump, he drives and escapes with a leg-bye
bad ball, too full down leg stump and it beats everyone for five wides
good length on middle and leg, turned right to the fielder
slower ball on leg stump, he misses out and the keeper collects
shorter this time, he shuffles and flicks down to fine leg for one
slower ball, well disguised, he drives and gets beaten
full outside off stump, driven into the covers
full on off stump, he shuffles and flicks into midwicket for one
overpitched, Razzaq drives down the ground for one more
too full and wide outside off stump
overpitched wide of off stump, he leans into it and drives superbly through the covers for four
full outside off stump and Akmal gives it the kitchen sink only to gets beaten all ends up
dropped! Bandara! Akmal chases a good-length ball just outside off, mistimes it completely and Bandara also fails to judge it, letting one go in the covers
slower ball, comes in and Akmal drives with an inside-edge onto the front pad
full outside off stump and its driven to cover for a quick single
shot! Charges out of his box, gets to the pitch, and drives it up and over cover for four
and again! This time he cheekily walks across his stumps and flicks one away to the fine leg fence
the fun ends for him this time though, as he slaps a slow full toss outside off stump in the air to Dilshan at backward point, who takes a simple chance
another full toss, which Sami drives at and ends up with a thick inside-edge onto the pads
pitches fullish on leg stump, and Razzaq just turns it to fine leg and runs hard

dropped! By that man Dilshan, would you believe? Razzaq flays the bat at a good-length delivery just outside off, and the fielder watches the the top-edge only to spill the chance...whats happening out there?
back of a length outside off stump and he leaves it be
another back of a length ball outside off stump, and this time Sami cuts and misses
short of a length, he runs it down to third man for one
fuller now, on off stump, and he drives out to long-off
short of a length outside off stump, he leaves it be
now its the slower ball, and Razzaq heaves at it only to miss...and it wasnt very far from off stump either
overpitched on this occasion, and Razzaq drives it to long-on
full on off stump, Sami stand and flicks to midwicket and scampers down the track
banged in way short over his head and called wide as he ducks
full ono off stump, chipped down to long-on
shot! Overpitched outside off stump and he stands and carves it, inside out, to the deep point ropes
now its a low full toss, which he drives at and gets saved by a thick inside-edge onto the back leg
slower ball outside off stump, driven to cover for a quick single
another chances goes begging, as Razzaq goes for the big shot, but the top-edge is misjudged by Silva on the leg side, allowing it to land safely for a single too
cracking shot, as Sami picks the slower one from Maharoof and creams it over mid-on for four
yes, he can bat! Now Sami judges a full delivery outside off stump to his best abilities and drives it over extra cover for another boundary
now thats hit hard! Sami on fire! Comes out of his crease and sends one flat over extra cover for maximum!
all over! Sami has another heave at one full on middle stump, fails to connect and hears the rattle of timber behind him, but well played
slower ball just outside off stump and Razzaq flashes at it and gets beaten
cleaned up by yet another slower delivery that pitches on leg stump, as Razzaq swings across the line and loses his leg stump
beaten by a good length ball outside off stump, which pitches and seams away, with good bounce
fuller this time, he stands and drives only to miss it again
banged in short, he goes for some sort of pull and ends up top-edging over the 'keeper's head
slower, fuller and this time he drives it to long-off to end Pakistan's innings at 313 for 9

inn2.comm: good length ball outside off stump, pushed to cover
full and moving down leg stump, he's rapped on the pads and there's a loud appeal, but thats outside the line of impact
good length outside off stump, driven to cover
full outside leg stump, brushes the pads on the way to Akmal
again outside off stump, pushed to mid-off for a quick single
full ball outside leg stump, he tries to work it on the leg side, hits the pad
good length ball outside off stump, pushed to cover for a brace
lands on a leg stump, its a no-ball, and Tharanga turns it fine for one
full on leg stump and he nicely clips it through midwicket for four
full outside off stump, he drives and gets a thick edge down to third man
short of a length, it lifts after pitching and Tharanga chases it to get beaten
overpitched outside off stump and he greets it with a firm push through the covers, top shot
good length ball just outside off stump, pitches and moves away, left alone by Kapugedera
back of a length, he gets up and drives to point
fuller and nipping and back in from outside off stump, strikes his front pad in front of middle stump, big shout, declined as the umpire reckoned it was going over the stumps...hmm...tough call
good length on leg stump, easily turned fine for one
back of a length outside off stump, Tharanga gets right behind the line and checks his shot to the off side
well played, was short and rising on him but he got over it and countered with movement with a firm cut shot over point for four
lovely seam movement on that one, pitching on a great length and beating him as he stands and drives loosely at it
good length just outside off stump, Kapugedera drives right to cover
width on offer and Kapugedera cashes in, driving on the up through cover and point
fuller this time and he punches towards points and sprints down the other end
good length on the stumps and Tharanga drives back to Sami
great ball! Lands on a sweet length on off stump and shaves away from the bat, squaring him up, and the ball just sails over the top of off stump to Akmal
dropped! He chases a short delivery outside off stump, gets the nick, and Akmal drops a simple take behind the stumps...poor stuff from him
and to rub it in, very nexy ball, Tharanga comes onto the front foot and cuts a good length delivery in front of point for a boundary
even better! Tharanga this time flicks one from Asif, bowling around the wicket this time, to deep backward square leg, what a shot
good length ball outside off stump, he stands and drives to cover
expensive over for Pakistan, as Tharanga finishes off with a lovely punch down the ground to long-on
Sami! He strikes with a nasty inswinger, which Kapugedera drives at with zero footwork, and it beats him for pace and movement to shatter middle stump
good ball! Quick and lifting outside off stump and the debutant plays and misses, a loud appeal for caught behind is turned down
short of a length down leg stump, and it brushes his pads
another inswinger clips him on the back thigh as he plays over it
oh ho, what a contest! This time he drives a full, swinging ball outside off stump and gets beaten for pace and movement...good baptism on debut for Warnapura
good length on off stump, he turns it to midwicket
good length delivery on leg stump, he looks to nudge it fine but it brushes his pads on the way to Akmal
back of a length outside off stump, he stands up and runs it to third man
a tad fuller now, on the stumps, and Tharanga drives to the man at cover
full outside off stump and he leans into a drive but again cant beat cover
short of a length outside off stump, he goes for the cut and misses again...he's looking shaky is the debutant
thats a shot, though! Warnapura flicks a full ball on leg stump over mid-on, lovely
back of a length and he rocks back, pushing straight to cover
short on middle and leg, he swivels and turns it to short midwicket this time
good length ball just outside off stump, he stands and pushes it to cover
this one lands outside off stump and moves away as Warnapura has a cut and a miss
full and sliding down the pads, wide called, duly
good stuff, pitching on a good length and then seaming away from him as he comes forward and is beaten on the drive
now thats some timing! Tharanga lunges forward and absolutely mothers a good length delivery through the covers for four
a tad full outside off stump and he greets it with a gentle push into the covers for a single

now Asif joins the fun, dismissing Warnapura on debut with one that's fuller, pitching in line with off stump, and getting it to come in and catch him somewhat deep in the crease in front of middle stump, and umpire Tiffen has little hesitation in raising the dreaded finger
good length on middle stump, he shuffles and works it to leg for one first ball
good length ball on off stump or thereabouts, and Tharanga drives to cover
full delivery on middle and leg, Jayawardene eases into a good-looking drive to mid-on
fuller outside off stump, he comes forward and pushes to cover
back of a length outside off stump and he allows it to pass by to Akmal
good length outside off stump, driven to short extra cover
this one jags back in off a good length and goes right through Jayawardene, and somehow manages to miss the top of off stump
shot, just coming forward and getting over a good length ball on leg stump and flicking over backward square leg for four
width offered and Tharanga makes sure it doesnt go begging, getting back and bringing the bat down fierce to pick up four backward of point, rasping shot that
a tad fuller outside off stump and he leans forward on the drive to the man at cover, good shot for nothing
full and angling down leg stump, now he flicks in the air and the ball lands safely in front of Hameed as square leg, though it was in the air for a brief while
short and very wide as Tharanga flays the bat, looking to cut, and cant connect
good length ball on the stumps, he turns it to midwicket
full on the pads, and the runs continue to flow for Tharanga, who clips down to fine leg where Rehman allows it to go through his legs
fuller outside off stump, pitching and moving away sharply to beat him on the drive
good length outside off stump, Jayawardene pushes to point
short of a length outside off stump, its a no-ball but he cant put it away as he misses out on the attempted cut shot
back of a length ball, another no-ball from Gul, and this time its cut down to third man for one
good length on middle and leg, turned to the on side
fuller ball on off stump, he drives back to Gul
slower one down leg side, he turns it to fine leg for the single
hello dolly! Gul bangs it in short down leg stump, an attempt to keep in him check, but Jayawardene spots it in flash and gets back on the hook, thumping it over fine leg for six, what a shot
better stuff, fuller and moving away outside off stump as Jayawardene comes forward, drives, and misses
good length outside off stump, driven to cover
a touch fuller, pitching and shaving away from Tharanga, who stands and drives but misses out
close! Tharanga cuts one outside off stump as it nips in off the seam, getting an inside-edge very nearly hitting the stumps and even Akmal's dive cant stop this from escaping for four
fuller ball outside off stump, he drives to mid-off for one
full outside off stump again, Jayawardene comes forward and drives to cover
good length, he uses the feet to meet it and ends up driving straight to mid-off
poor stuff, really, as Tharanga misses one and the ball clips the pads and runs to gully, where a poor throw costs four extras
short and wide, he gets up quickly and cuts, getting a top-edge over the slips for four
full on leg stump, turned away for an easy single
full outside off stump, he drives, mistiming it in front of point and sprinting one
full outside off stump, he drives and gets an inside-edge to short midwicket
good length on middle and leg, he flicks straight to short midwicket this time
shot, as he comes forward to one just outside off stump and drives on the up between cover and point
good length outside off stump, pushed to point
too good is Tharanga, just getting a step forward, presenting the full face of the bat, and punching one down the ground past mid-off for four
back of a length outside off stump, he steers it down to a diving Gul at third man, who saves runs
moves in off the seam as Jayawardene gets over it and turns it, late, in front of square leg for one
moves down leg, he chases it and gets an inside-edge onto the back leg and then responds to his captain's call
gently tossed up outside off stump, and he leaves it alone
tossed up again, and he comes forward to drive to cover
short and wide, he cuts hard by Nazir throws himself around at backward point
the arm ball goes down leg side for a wide
tossed up on leg stump, Tharanga looks to play it fine but it runs off the pads
short again, he cuts and this time Nazir doesnt pull off his dive well and Tharanga gets two
oversteps, its another arm ball that Tharanga is unable to nudge off the pads
almost! Malik tosses it up on leg stump again, Tharanga looks to tuck it away, gets a leading edge that pops up and lands safely in front of the bowler
and begins with a long hop thats pulled away in style
looped up on off stump, defended
flipper outside off stump, he cuts but straight to point
another flipper outside off stump, Jayawardene cuts and misses and Akmal and Afridi shout out an appeal
still short and wide, and this time he connects, cutting out to deep point for one
well flighted up, and he defends to the off side
tossed up outside off stump, he cuts hard to backward point
another arm ball, which he tries to cut, ends up with an inside-edge back onto the pads
tossed up on leg stump, he gets down in an attempt to sweep it away but misses
tossed up, he comes forward and drives into the covers
tossed up again, this time he places his drive to the man at cover
flatter on leg stump, he places it to square leg for one
short outside off stump, glided to short third man
flighted up on middle and leg, he drives to mid-on
quicker ball clips the front leg just outside off stump and they all appeal, in vain
Tharanga falls, two short of a fifty, sweeping one on leg stump, with a thick top-edge, to Nazir at short fine leg
tossed up outside off stump, he opens his account with a nudge into the covers
quick, short, wide, and cut out to backward point for a couple
tossed up outside off stump, and he's not interested in that one
flighted outside off stump, he sweeps across the line and fails to make contact
short and wide, he rocks back and cuts past gully
thats the flipper, to which Silva goes back and is saved by an inside-edge onto the pads
short and wide again, he cuts but cant beat gully this time
flighted outside off stump, he again misses out on the sweep and there's an appeal for caught behind
tossed up, he comes out and drives to deep point for the single
tossed up, patted back down the track
quicker through the air, driven, with good use of the feet, to midwicket
flat on leg stump, he turns it straight to the leg side fielder
tossed up outside leg stump, and he plays it off the pads to short fine leg
tossed up on leg stump once again, this time he gets bat on it and picks up one to deep square leg
tossed up on on leg stump, Jayawardene sweeps hard down to fine leg where Gul lets it run through his palms...ridiculous fielding down there
tossed up, he drives to mid-of
tossed up again, now he uses the feet better and drives down to long-off
shorter and quicker, he cuts loosely down to third man
short again, he makes room and cuts but cant beat point
tossed up, pushed to point for a quick single
tossed up, he pads it away
quicker on leg stump, nugded fine for one
tossed up, he gets to the pitch and finds the gap in the covers for four, welcome boundary for Sri Lanka, who've slipped under the radar a bit
tossed up, defended back to Malik
tossed up, driven to mid-on
tossed up on leg stump, Silva sweeps to short fine leg
another specialty of his, the flipper, and Silva goes back to only get reprieved again thanks to an inside-edge onto the pads
well looped up on off stump, and he defends it
good flight again, and he drives straight to cover
quicker out the back of the hand, and he hurries to cut to backward point
this one spins in sharply and Silva gets back to defend
tossed up on leg stump, he sweeps it fine for one
gently tossed up, and he employs the sweep to good use again
tossed up again, this time he defends to Malik
tossed up, he sweeps out to deep fine leg for a brace
dropped! Jayawardene sweeps one again, this time not so fine, and Sami at long leg cant hold onto it, another pretty poor effort out in the deep
a fraction flatter and shorter on leg stump, he's quickly into position, sweeping hard for two
oh shot! Tossed up outside off stump and Silva connects with a powerful sweep to deep square leg
short again, cuts it hard but to gully
gives it some air and Jayawardene comes out to drive to long-off for just the single
Afridi gets another, forcing Silva to shimmy down the track and chip one straight down Razzaq's throat at long-on, he just went through with the aerial shot and found the man positioned right there
he gets a flipper first ball, which he looks to cut but misses
short again, this time he cuts well out to the deep for one to get off the mark
quicker one, spins in as he shuffles and works it to midwicket
tossed up, he shuffles down the track and takes it on the pads
tossed up, Dilshan drives and gets beaten by the exaggerated turn
tossed up, he uses the feet and drives to cover
fired in down leg stump, Dilshan looks to sweep but gets it off the pads to Akmal
tossed up on leg, he turns it to short fine leg
short on middle and leg, Dilshan turns it fine
width offered and he cuts to deep point for the single
tossed up outside off stump, he drives and misses
quicker on leg stump, he turns it to fine leg
flatter outside off stump, this time he mistimes the cut shot into the ground
tossed up, he comes out and drives it to long-off
a fraction shorter on off stump and he nudges it to cover
tossed up wide off stump, he makes room and cuts into the covers for one
tossed up, he takes it on the full and gets one down to long-on
tossed up, he gets down and sweeps it away for the single
another arm ball which he misreads and ends up playing all over outside off stump
straighter one on middle and leg, which he turns away to square leg
fraction short outside off stump and Dilshan cuts well backward of square for two
short again, this time Jayawardene cuts to gully
fired up on leg stump, he sweeps to fine leg for just the single
tossed up, and he drives to long-off
short, and he cuts hard to point
looped up, he comes out and drives back to Afridi
flighted down leg stump, Jayawardene sees it early and sweeps, and once again Gul is the culprit down at fine leg, misfielding and letting the ball through his hands
tossed up, uses the feet well and drives to long-on
raises his fifty with a gentle push down to long-on, crucial innings
tossed up outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to cover

and the captain gets one, pushing one through faster and extracting sharp turn from the surface, and Dilshan, who's gone back trying to drive, gets hit on the pad in front of the stumps, a very, very loud appeal is upheld
oversteps, and its turned from leg stump down to fine leg
tossed up on leg again and senior Jayawardene nudges it around the corner
gives it some air outside off stump and he defends to the off side
tossed up on middle and leg, turned to midwicket for a single

well, if he's not biffing runs, he's getting wickets at Abu Dhabi, is this man Afridi, who gets a third with a ripping flipper that drifts up, and then zooms in to strikeJayawardene on the full in front of middle and leg, and umpire Tiffen agrees with everyone in green who appeals
tossed up, he comes onto the front foot and defends
fraction shorter on off stump, and he pushes it to cover
thats the wrong 'un, which Maharoof turns to midwicket
tossed up, he drives it down to long-off to get off the mark
tossed up, he comes out and defends off the front foot
flatter this time, on off stump, he drives to long-off
tossed up on leg and he turns it to fine leg for the single
tossed up as usual, this time he drives down to long-on
straighter one on middle and leg, Jayawardene uses the feet well and converts it into a low full toss and flicks to short fine leg
quicker, pushes it back to Malik
quick and rising outside off stump, he rolls the wrists over it and cuts to third man for one
another flipped on the stumps and Maharoof defends to leg
tossed up and now he flicks to deep square leg
good loop on that one, which he pushes back to Afridi from off stump
straighter one, and he shuffles as he turns it to deep square leg
spin, bounce and turn this time as a quicker one scoots past Maharoof's defense, and that very nearly drew the edge too, well bowled as Afridi completes a good spell
and he's welcome back by a blistering drive from Jayawardene, using his feet and driving up and over mid-on for four

good change to bring back Asif, it would seem, and with that big wicket Sri Lanka's last hope fades! Jayawardene goes for a pull to one that he should've come forward to, missing it completely as it  nips in off a good length and knocks back middle stump
good length outside off stump, he drives to cover
good length, tighter this time, and he defends back to Asif
even fuller and straighter this time, and Bandara opens up with a push to mid-on
back of a length outside off stump, and Maharoof pushes to cover to end a good over from Asif
good start, up there on off stump, and Bandara drives back to him
good length outside off stump, now he steers it to point
fuller on about leg stump, he defends and gets an inside-edge onto the pads, which trickles to fine leg
now he gets going, pulling a long-hop wide of mid-on for a much-needed four, but Sri Lanka need many, many more of those
okay, he says, I can try and do this, pulling another short delivery and looking on as the inside-edge races away to fine leg for four more
make it three in a row! Gul's problems continue, as he bowls one fuller on middle and leg stump, and sees it smacked wide of long-on for another boundary
full on off stump, driven to midwicket
this one lifts off a short length outside off stump, beating Bandara, who flashes and misses
he oversteps, its on the pads and rolls away towards short fine leg
back of a length outside off stump, Bandara pushes straight to cover
now its a slower ball, full outside off stump, thats beats him
back of a length but on leg stump, allowing him to turn it to fine leg for one
fullish outside off stump, but Maharoof can only drive into the covers for one...well then again, thats what he probably wants, to keep strike ahead of Bandara
naah, not if they keep getting dot balls like that, as Maharoof fails to put one way outside off stump
and he's gone, looping up a well disguised slow, full delivery straight to Butt at cover
he too falls, pulling Gul straight to Hameed at midwicket, and this match is almost over
and he goes first ball, playing all over a full and straight delivery that crashes into middle stump as Sri Lanka go down by 98 runs
